SUB : Extension of Passes for agencies engaged by Airlines for supplying of 
Manpower at various Airports for providing ground handling services - Reg 
It is informed that passes issued to various ground handling agencies for 
providing manpower to various airlines and expiring on 31.12.2010 is hereby extended 
for a period of One month i.e. upto 31.01.2011. 
This issue with the approval of Appropriate Authority. 
No. C/DCS/GEN/2010 
December 31, 2010 
Yours faithfully. 
Regional Dy. Commissioner of Security (CA)

The Chairman, Airline Operators Committee for information please.
